content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'demoDB')
    CREATE DATABASE demoDB
GO

USE demoDB
GO

-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Password01'
-- GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL myCredentialManaged
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE myDataSource WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://lhadlsgen2storage.blob.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = myCredentialManaged
)
